alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 16 at 2:46AM PST until December 18 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM FRIDAY TO 2 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Areas of north to northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Ventura County Interior Valleys, Ventura County Coastal Valleys and San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...From 3 AM Friday to 2 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Roadways may be affected by gusty cross winds. This includes Interstate 5 and the 23, 101, 118, 170, 210, and 405 freeways. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys
